description: Loser has to bottom! But Blake doesn't mind. In fact, he might have lost the game on purpose just to get some of Eric's massive thick stud meat in his mouth and ass. Blake's a verbal little horndog, and he really gets Eric going with his talk. Or maybe it was a hate-fuck. All we know is that it's fucking hot!
title: CitiBoyz 55: 'Towel Boyz', Scene #02
